parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Yes, certainly, even so. A primary particle of strong affirmation; yes.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To read, know again, know certainly, recognize, discern. From ana and ginosko; to know again, i.e. to read.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.
From an obsolete particle ne- and epos; not speaking, i.e. An infant; figuratively, a simple-minded person, an immature Christian.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I give suck, (b) I suck. From thele; to suckle, to suck.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From kata and a derivative of artios; to complete thoroughly, i.e. Repair or adjust.
Praise. Apparently a prime word; properly, a story, but used in the sense of epainos; praise.
